titleStmt.title: Henry E. Collins to John Boyle
CWG11601

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p:
Cincinnati Ohio:
April 21. 1863
Adjt. Genl. Boyle:
Dr Sir --
The recommendation of Louis W. Little for promotion, on file at Your office, is approved and a vacancy Existing in Co. "E" 2d Ky. Cavalry is recommended --

I am Sir
very Respectfully
Henry E Collins
Lt Col 2d Ky Cavly

Louis W. Little com 1: Lieut Company C 2d Cavy. -- April 21. 1864 -- vice Bird P. Brooks dismissed.
1. 2. 3. 4. 5

2 Cavy
Cincinnati Ohio
April 21s 1864
Collins H. E
Lt. Col 2d Cavl
Says the recommendation on file in your office of Louis W Little is approved and a vacancy in Co "E" is recommended.

Issue Coy C.
Boyle
Com issd & deld
April 30. 1864
Recd A G. O. 29" Aprl 1864
